faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: You can return any product within 30 days of purchase.

faqs.question: How can I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Delivery usually takes 3-5 business days within the country.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal.
